review_text: Pat & Tom are fabulous hosts. Every little detail in their home was well appointed and clearly done with great attention to detail. It was absolutely spotlessly clean and fresh. We enjoyed learning the history of the home as well. We already booked for a second visit and are certain this will be our home away from home when we visit our son and his family in Meadville.

Great place to rest up on our weekend getaway. The apartment was immaculate, secure, and comfortable. The country setting was nice, and the property was easy to get to. The host was extremely responsive to any questions we had. We'll plan on staying here again when in the area. Don't hesitate to book this one!
Great place in a serene setting. Shower water pressure was the only disappointment.
The best AirBnB hosts we've ever had. Patty and Tom are so nice, they even helped us unload our car! The place was clean and comfy. The area is beautiful. Highly recommend. 🙂
I have stayed here numerous times and can’t convey how wonderful the hosts and accommodations are . Highly recommended!!!
Will stay here every time I come to Meadville. Fantastic hosts.
My favorite place to stay in Meadville!!!

We had a perfect stay at Doc and Alice’s Place. The room was lovely. I did not realize it would have a kitchenette. We loved being able to have breakfast and coffee in our place.
The town of Meadville is a cute little town. I would recommend a walk along the Ernst Trail.
Have stayed here many times and will continue to . Great hosts and perfect accommodations. Will always return !!

My husband and I stayed for quick visit to see our son that attends Allegheny College. It was a perfect for us. Good location and comfortable space. Host was proactive with communication. And the bed was extremely comfortable!
One of the best places I have ever stayed . Hosts are fabulous and very easy to get a hold of . Place is perfect and the hosts even have snacks and coffee. Will always return !
Clean, Comfortable, Convenient
A great place for my quick overnight stay. Clean as a whistle. Patty is a great communicator. I’d definitely stay again!
This is such a wonderful place in Meadville. Very cozy and welcoming, and the story is very heartwarming. We will be back, and recommending to all our family and friends!

We were only here for one night, but this place was exactly what every Airbnb should be like. Very clean, with nice decor, and a wonderful bed. And some snacks! Patty and Tom thought of everything you could possible need. Will not hesitate to stay here again. We loved it!

We enjoyed our stay at Patricia and Thomas's place. We were there to visit family, so we did not spend a lot of time there, but it was convenient to Franklin and Meadville. The place was very clean and welcoming.
What a great place to stay! Very comfortable and clean. It fit our needs perfectly. The host was very nice and communicative.

The apartment was perfect for a quick trip to visit my daughter at Allegheny College. The school is only 10m away. The place was clean and comfortable. There were extra touches such as snacks and beverages in the fridge. Patricia reached out to make sure everything was as expected. The apt is on a nice quiet street. I would definitely stay again.
Will be a return visitor.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Alice and Doc’s place! The decor was charming, and everything was very clean. The hosts were very responsive! We also enjoyed that the place had an interesting history.
What a great place to stay. So close to Meadville, Allegheny College, and Guys Mills. Patricia and Tom were fantastic hosts. We will definitely stay again!
Patty and Tom are wonderful hosts and their cottage has been perfect for us - clean, convenient, friendly and helpful. Recommend this cottage to anyone. Enjoy!

Pat and Tom’s accommodations were excellent. It was so spacious and sparkling clean. Little snacks and drinks were provided and they had two tv’s (one of which was in the bedroom) with the most comfortable king size bed. It’s just about 10 minutes from downtown Meadville. The communication was great! We will definitely stay there again when we come to town. Thank you Pat and Tom.
Another perfect stay with Patty and Tom. Very pleased and will return soon!

Lovely place and wonderful hosts! We enjoyed our stay very much. It was warm, cozy and very inviting. Communication from hosts on amenities and stay were great. We had everything we needed. We will be back.
This place worked great for us to stay overnight while my brother and I attended Faith Builders Teacher's Week.

Absolutely best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in. Extremely clean, accommodations were perfect and as described. The hosts went above and beyond with amenities…from beverages in refrigerator, to snacks on counter and even provided toiletries if needed. Quiet, peaceful country like setting. We will definitely return in the future.

Our stay at "Alice & Doc's Place" was very enjoyable. We were greeted with a clean welcoming place. There were sodas, bottled water, juices and a basket full of snacks. They have the place stocked with the basics you would need in any kitchen: spices,oil, sugar, coffee and supplies for the shower/bathroom etc. We had a great stay! Thank you!!
Patty and Tom's place was as wonderful as ever. We'll continue to stay with them any time we're in Meadville.

What a great stay! Patricia was so proactive in communication, and we felt right at home. One of the most important things to me in an Airbnb is a comfortable bed, and this delivered!!
A sweet little sitting area to enjoy the birds and beautiful flowers planted around the apartment made it so nice to sit outside at night.
This is a true gem 💕
The king-sized bed is extremely comfortable and Patty's place feels like home. Another wonderful stay.

This stay was the best part about our weekend in town for a wedding. The host were so polite and accommodating. The location was great, parking was great, the yard and property are incredibly maintained and the space is really just quaint and pleasant. I recommend Davenport cidary for evening drinks like 10-12 minutes away. All in all a really nice airbnb that feels like a proper bnb. The host got an iron and ironing board out and ready for me and since our rental car was electric they setup an extension cord so I could top it off over night while we slept. (I don’t recommend relying on 110 charging if you have a rental electric car go to a charging station and don’t rely on your host to provide this for you! They were just helping us in a bind) I don’t know these host personally but they were inviting like your own parents would be. 10/10
-keith
Very nice place to stay! We loved the California King bed, the convenience of the washer and dryer and the overall ambience of the place... we will be back

Patty and Tom's cottage apartment was perfect. Clean and obviously cared-for. It was easy to get to and easy to get in. Had everything I needed - complete kitchen, bathroom and the king sized bed has a very comfortable mattress. It also has a wonderful backstory about the lady that once lived there. I'll be back soon. Thank you, Patty.
Nicely appointed accommodations with comfy king-sized bed. Would definitely stay here again.

The place was easy to find with very descriptive photos. the setting had lovely country charm. The style was formal yet comfortable and inviting. The home was spotless. The hosts thought of all the creature comforts. By all means go you will relax and enjoy yourself.
The apartment is ideal for a couple or 3 adults. The location is out of town, very peaceful and quite.

We only stayed for one night, but it was very comfortable and private. This would be very appropriate for a longer stay, especially if you want to cook some meals for yourself. Convenient for a visit with my daughter at Allegheny College.

Patty was a fantastic host. Went above and beyond to ensure our needs were met. The apartment is a wonderful place to stay. Large, comfortable king bed, nice kitchen and special touches throughout the apartment that give it a warm cozy feel. If we ever need a place to stay in meadville , this will be our first choice.
The place was lovely, quiet & peaceful. Thoughtful extras left for our enjoyment. Had all amenities a vacationer could want. Instructions were helpful in welcome book.
We’ve stayed in many rental places over the years and this place was the best! Spacious, beautifully decorated, great location on the creek. We’d love to visit again!

We were in town for graduation at Allegheny College, so there were three generations staying in, or stopping by Gene's place. There was plenty of room for all of us and everyone felt comfortable. The kitchen has everything you need to prepare a meal and then some. For the coffee lovers, there is a keurig and a coffee press. The basics were so well stocked that we thought other members of our party had brought items supplied by our host. Gene was very responsive to questions both prior to and during our stay. It is clear that he cares about providing a nice place to stay as well as a good experience. We wish all hosts were as caring as Gene and all properties as nice as his.

Gene’s place was perfect to visit family around Crawford county. The creek was lovely and the bird watching so relaxing. Gene went the extra mile by stocking the fridge, setting the table, etc. the place has so many sitting places to enjoy the beautiful scenery it was hard to decide each morning where to have coffee. We felt right at home with 4 adults and one dog. Would absolutely come back.
Gene's house is very well accommodated and on such a beautiful property! We wished the weather was a bit warmer during our stay to spend more time along the river and kayaking. Definitely recommend!

Our stay was fantastic! There were 4 of us in the house and there was more space than we could use!
The provided breakfast items and snacks were a welcome surprise.
Gene's place lacked for nothing. Too bad it wasn't the right time for kayaking.
We would definitively come bach again and have already recommended it to friends and family.

Had a great time at our hockey tournament we were in town for and felt safe, relaxed and calm while at the house. There was enough room and for the 6 of us and our dog. Gene was very friendly, kind and accommodating.

A perfect place to stay for our Erie and Pittsburgh pursuits. Extraordinarily spacious for our group of 5 plus dog. Quiet neighborhood surrounded by nature. Well stocked fridge made breakfast prep a breeze. And the well appointed, chef-friendly kitchen enabled a homemade dinner. The Christmas tree was a nice, festive touch as well.

The house welcomed us in with a table set for dinner, snacks and breakfast foods in the refrigerator, plenty of space downstairs to spread out for 6 adults. Disappointed that we were not allowed to use fireplace as we had cold nights to enjoy it, but understandable. The kitchen was perfect for multiple stations and people to prepare a holiday meal. Plenty of cookware and utensils. The yard was great for the dogs and the Creek provided a lovely backdrop and gentle sound. We were looking for a meeting point for our extended family to share Thanksgiving together and this fit our needs well. Gene was a great host available and quick to respond. Two separate table areas allowed a spot to play games together. Wonderful few days.

Gene was a wonderful host! The house was just as the pictures indicated. The view of French Creek was great. Loved the fact that it was at the end of the road made it very private. The snacks and breakfast food waiting for us was a very sweet gesture. I would highly recommend this property and Gene as a host!!!

We were delighted with our stay. The house was perfect for my husband, my brother and myself to stay and visit family in the area. Gene’s house is very well appointed and furnished with everything we needed to feel right at home. The screened and open porches were excellent for enjoying the views of French Creek and listening to the many birds or watching the rabbits and chipmunks. The kitchen was well equipped and along with a big dining table allowed us to share a beautiful space with visiting family members for breakfast and lunch.
Gene was very responsive and helpful. We would definitely stay here again.

The place was beautiful inside and put. Very peaceful. The view of the creek was nice. We enjoyed the fire pit. Within walking distance to small stores. Well stocked with cooking and cleaning supplies. Very clean. Loved the house. Beautifully decorated.
beautiful place
From the moment we walked up it was incredible. Beautiful kitchen, was fun to cook in. View were gorgeous and having kayaks available was a great added bonus.

We vacation all over, usually using VRBO. This was my first time booking thru Air B&B and Genes home didn’t disappoint. Hands down best host, house and price up to this point. Everything was updated, clean, and above expectations. I told him we would be in late Thursday due to having to leave after my sons football practice and he even went as far as to leave snacks for the kids. Overall great host, house, price and location. I would definitely book again and recommend Gene to any of my friends traveling to the area.
The room was exceptionally clean, and she owns a very friendly canine companion.
It’s a very comfortable place to stay - has everything you need. Location is also very good and easy to get too.

We have always preferred this home compared to the hotels because it is spacious, very close to the Robertson athletic complex/college, and in a peaceful location. Deborah is a wonderful host. Our daughter has graduated and hopefully will continue to use this place when she visits as an alumni. Thanks Deborah and hope to see you again.
I had a great time staying with lucy deborah. No issues at all. The place was well worth what you pay for, very clean, very private and comfortable.
Another great, easy stay! Thank you!

Had a wonderful overnight stay! The accommodations were beautifully decorated, thoughtfully appointed, and very comfortable. There were many helpful details that we appreciated. The private entrance also made it easy for us to come and go without disturbing our host. This home is located in a very convenient area, with quick access to the college, the town, and local parks etc. It was a delight to meet our gracious host (and her darling pup). We recommend highly!!!
Deborah has a beautiful home in a quiet neighborhood. I would stay there again without any hesitation
Nice place close to Allegheny college.
This has become our go-to place to stay when visiting our Allegheny student. Easy, clean, and convenient! Deborah is a great host.
Always a great choice! Deborah’s place is quiet, clean and near the campus. Highly recommend

Deb was a great host for our short visit. She responded very quickly and was extremely flexible with our check in time. The place was very peaceful for a good nights rest and her puppy was too cute! Hope I can stop by again.
Fantastic price for a very comfortable LARGE room . Excellent communication with Deborah.
I had another lovely stay at Deb’s place. I travel to the area somewhat frequently and do intend to always stay here. I have really enjoyed both my stays and cannot wait to meet your puppy, Deb! 😊

I was very happy to find this place for a quiet, comfortable rest when visiting relatives in Meadville. This is a terrific place, an entire basement level apartment, for a great price. Deb is a gracious host with whom I enjoyed chatting at check in and check out.
Deborah was a great host! Our space was cozy, clean, and comfortable. I'm sorry we really didn't have a little time to visit.
Great stay as always
The place was very clean and matched the description and photos. Deborah was a very friendly host.
We have stayed here multiple times. Always an excellent place to stay in Meadville.
Deb was very friendly and responsive ahead of the stay. The place is cozy and quiet.
I greatly enjoyed my stay at Deb’s and definitely plan to book her stay again when I’m in the area. You have a massive suite to yourself with a private entrance. Deb was incredibly accommodating!

We have stayed at Deb's so many times, I have lost count. She is a wonderful host and such a sweet and kind person. Her place is always very clean and the bed is very comfortable. My husband and I love the fireplace and it is a big plus in the wintertime. Whenever we go to Meadville, we always check to see if her wonderful place is available before we even look at any other Airbnb properties. Thanks Deb for once again making our stay awesome.

Deborah’s room was clean, spacious and comfortable. Checking in was easy and Deborah was very accommodating and pleasant. There’s a little kitchenette, a nice sized private bathroom, small couch and double/queen sized bed that was comfy. And a dresser for your clothes.
It is a lower/basement type room and there was a hint of dampness in the air upon arrival but Deb had a dehumidifier running that quickly cleared that up. Private Access to the room is around the back through the yard. A walkway would be ideal but not a deal breaker.
I was in Meadville on business and Deborah was helpful in giving me directions to where I needed to be. I didn’t get much leisure time due to work but all in all I enjoyed staying at Deb’s place and will absolutely stay again if I find myself out that way.
I definitely recommend Deborah’s space to a solo or couple traveling through the area.
I had a lovely stay and will book again!
Very nice room with large bathroom. Very clean and comfortable. Deb explains everything very well.

My first time staying in a host's home. Deb's basement apartment is spacious, comfortable., and beautiful - very tastefully decorated and clean. The mattress was AMAZING, I think the most comfortable I've ever slept on in an airbnb. Although surprisingly the pillows aren't great, but I always bring my own :) The fireplace was a nice touch. Walking down through the yard to the outside entrance wasn't bad at all but might be dicey in the winter. There is noticeable noise of footsteps above, but the dehumidifier running helps cover that. (Note that it's best to empty the dehu bucket before bedtime, so it doesn't reach full during the night. Then you get loud beeps and dead silence which I learned the first night and then forgot to do the second night - my bad! I look forward to staying again!

In a few words, worth every penny. I needed an affordable CLEAN SAFE place to stay in Meadville for a short stay. This was the perfect solution. Owner was accommodating, pleasant, and very responsive.
House was clean. Easy check in and out.
No complaints.
This was my second stay at Deb’s place. Always clean and communicative.
Very clean place to stay. Definitely would recommend the host was very polite and helpful. Definitely will stay there again
This is a great place to stay for Allegheny College parents. Very clean, nice private space. Deborah is a thoughtful host who proactively answers questions and leaves nothing to chance!
Deborah keeps a wonderful space! It's cozy and clean. This was my second time staying and she had been accommodating with check-in, both times. Thanks!!!

My husband and I stayed one night for a wedding and was pleasantly surprised how comfortable, clean and quiet the accommodations. Deborah is a wonderful host very nice - gave us the key and we came in and out as we please. The kitchen, bathroom and furniture were very clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay there again.
The perfect, cozy accommodations for a quick getaway. Space was just right!
Very clean and well located accommodation. The host was friendly and responsive by message.

Perfect for a short stay in Meadville. We were visiting our daughter at Allegheny and going to a Cross Country meet. Walked over to see the meet, visited all day with our daughter, had a clean and comfortable place to stay at night.
good place to stay
This is a great place! Lovely backyard and patio, plus lots of space in this open floor stay. Perfect for visiting Alleghany College only a few minutes away!
Deborah's place was as described and she was a wonderful host. I would definitely book again if I'm in the area.
Very accommodating!
Deb is awesome! Top notch host. Would stay again!

We had another very comfortable stay at Deborah's while visiting Meadville for a few days. The spacious, finished lower level has large windows overlooking a beautiful rear yard and the private entrance opens to the patio. The bed and couch are both comfortable; the kitchenette is convenient; the space is tastefully decorated and furnished with quality linens.
It was raining when we arrived and Deborah met us at the front door, with a friendly greeting and the direct route to our accommodations. On our several visits, she has been kind and responsive to any questions we have. I have no hesitation about recommending a stay at Deborah's to anyone visiting the area.
Was super helpful with things. I can do in very kind. Really appreciate you allowing me to stay. Thank you so much.!
We had everything we needed for a good overnight stay. It was clean and comfortable and well located to suit our needs.
Deborah was very responsive and extremely friendly! Her place is in a very quaint area, easy to get to, and quiet. Definitely will be staying her again.

A great place .. great value.. It is exactly what we needed for couple overnight stays while spending time in the area.. Read the description .. look at pictures.. it is comfortable, clean.. and everything explained and described!! 👍
Deborah and her place were just what we needed. Very private and beautiful yard and neighborhood. It is just North of Allegheny College and Meadville.

Deborah was super friendly and a fantastic host. She was extremely flexible with my 11:30PM check in, as I was unable to arrive any sooner. The accommodated space was spotless clean, very homey, and quiet. Bed was comfortable, extra linens and towels were provided too. Private patio space outside of the private entry door was a nice bonus, and if I was staying longer than one night, would’ve spent a lot of time out there, as her landscaping and flowers on the property are beautiful and very well kept. Would definitely stay here again! Highly recommend!
Great hidden little gem of a place!
Deborah’s place meted are needs very well. Quiet, private, good location, and accommodating host all appreciated. Would definitely stay there in the future.

Although we had to cancel due to an emergency - she has always been a wonderful host. Her place is our favorite to stay when we are in town for horse shows - much better than the hotel we have stayed at!!
This was our 6th time staying at Deborah's place. She is a wonderful host and her place is clean, comfortable and a very nice peaceful neighborhood. We look forward to staying with Deborah again.
Deborah is a great host, very understanding and attentive.

My dog and I stayed just one night, but it was an enjoyable stay. The accommodations were really clean, roomy, with a really comfy bed. Additionally, we had our own separate entrance, which was nice. Just down the street from Deborah’s place, were some wooded trails to go for walks. Overall, my experience was positive. If ever I am in the area again, I would definitely request a stay at her place.
Debs place was great for my short stay! Everything was spotless and it smelled great! She’s very responsive and sweet! If I’m ever out that way again I would definitely stay again!
great place to stay! thank you.
Would stay again. Deb was a great host. Very kind and helpful.

Deborah is a friendly and thoughtful host who greeted us on arrival and showed us around our lovely room. We had a comfortable bed, a cozy seating area, a well-stocked kitchenette, and a large bathroom. The room has a separate entrance (down the lawn behind the house). The neighbourhood is quiet and close to Allegheny. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and recommend this place!
Perfect place to lay your head and relax. Better than a hotel.
Great place to stay
Deb’s place was beautiful. Huge space and a very gracious host. The place was spotless and the vicinity also felt warm. I’d definitely recommend the place.
Deb was a great host! The space was fantastic and felt very homey. Would definitely recommend for anyone visiting Meadville. Close proximity to the College. Right on Park Ave
Nice plce to stay when im in town for work.

Deborah is an excellent, hassle free host. Her place is on a corner lot in a quiet residential neighborhood walking distance from Allegheny College. I found the unit to be quite clean and easily accessible through the back entrance. I hope to stay here again in the near future.
Everything was great!
Debra’s place was a real value. I truly felt right at home, and strongly recommend!

Deborah is such a wonderful host! She communicated very quickly and was very proactive when all of a sudden a storm came through and knocked the power out. She was quick to offer flashlights and candles. She was apologetic but it was really Mother Nature’s doing. She is so polite and kind. I would definitely recommend staying at her place if needing a place in Meadville or surrounding area. Very convenient to 19, 86, I-79. I would be careful if suffer from knee issues as getting in and out of bed was a little problematic since so low to floor. But she shows pictures, I just didn’t pay attention to those kind of details. The living area was so cute and she has a detailed page how to work the tv. The kitchenette was well stocked. She even had a little basket of snacks and a pitcher of water in mini fridge. She has toiletries in the bathroom just in case. Checking out was just as easy as checking in. Great place and superb hostess. Thank you for the weekend of respite!
Very cozy
Comfortable place to stay after working 14 hour days. Was able ro rejuvenate from the comfort.
Place was exactly what I needed, great for a comfortable place to sleep and shower while on the road to other locations
Very kind hearted and helping

Deborah’s place is a great choice when visiting Meadville. It’s our son’s last year at Allegheny College and we were so glad we found this alternative to the area hotels! Lovely setting near the campus.

Deborah is a great host and so considerate. My husband and I have stayed at Deborah's Airbnb several times and it is always very clean and comfortable with everything that I needed for a very pleasant stay. This time I was the only one who stayed and I felt safe and secure and enjoyed my stay immensely and the fireplace was amazing since it was so cold in Meadville. We have already booked with her for July and I am sure we will be staying there many more times over the years. I was able to spend some time talking with Deborah which I also enjoyed. She is a very nice lady. Thank you Deborah for everything and I look forward to seeing you in July.
I loved the place, and I’ll look for it next time I’m in town!

I was very impressed with the studio apartment. It was very clean, tastefully decorated, spacious, and very cozy. Deb was very accommodating. I will come back when needed and recommend her to anyone looking for someplace to stay in the Meadville area.
Great host, clean room, would stay again.
We have stayed at Deborah's AIRBNB a number of times. It it is consistently the best place to stay in the Meadville area.

We stayed at Deborah’s with our two dogs for 1.5 weeks while visiting family. It was very quiet and private. We didn’t use the kitchenette much as we mostly ate at our family members house but it was the perfect size for wish we needed. Deborah was kind and responsive and we are happy to know we have a place to stay at whenever we visit family again. One thing to note is you can hear people walking around upstairs but it didn’t bother us at all. Thanks Deborah!
The perfect place for our quick Meadville stay. Thank you Deborah!

Deborah was an amazing host. Great communication, she responded to questions quickly. My schedule isn’t traditional, and she was extremely flexible and accommodating of my schedule. Her place is cute, clean, and peaceful. I would definitely stay there again.

I have not had such a relaxed and lovely time in Meadville in years! The location was perfect, and I was able to zip in and out of town to see friends, take walks at Woodcock, and enjoy the parade with ease! Comfortable bed, and amazing artwork! I'm already looking forward to my next stay!
Clean, comfortable accomodations! Easy check-in and no problems during our stay.
Deb is very nice and accommodating to her guests. The place and clean and in a quiet neighborhood. Very close to town.
Very close to college/hospital/downtown. Clean apartment with plenty of space for 1-2 people.

Exactly as pictured. A finished basement with private entrance, kitchette and private bathroom. You also have access to come in the front door if there is inclement weather. Deborah was super responsive and her grandson was charming!
It was a big space, quite, there's a little private porch for you to sit on and enjoy the backyard. Very nice place to stay. I enjoyed it.

Deborahs place is so so so perfect ! Plenty of space. Great quiet neighborhood. Comfy bed. Off street parking. Hot shower! Clean. Safe. Realizing . And Deb is fantastic !!!! This is an A plus plus plus property ! Thank you for everything, Deb !

Miss Deb was an amazing host!
Helpful and Courteous . Would stay again and highly recommend.
This Airbnb host has a clean tidy big room with amenities and it can be well lit. Easy to find too. We were very comfortable.

This is a lovely space on a quiet street. Deborah is very pleasant at check in and shows you the place. It's a spacious and cozy basement with a very comfortable bed. It's connected to the main part of the house, but it has its own entrance as well, so you're not walking through the main house to come and go. I recommend it.

Great location, close to the college.
Deborah was welcoming and her place was wonderful. Spacious and well equipped. The bed was very comfortable. I will be returning!

This was our second week-long stay at Deborah’s. We were very comfortable. She was almost immediately responsive to any questions I asked. The space is roomy, quiet, private and tastefully decorated. There were thoughtful considerations like extra blankets, a variety of soaps and shampoos, plenty of towels and even a spare toothbrush. The wi-fi worked well for us, too.
It’s a very private and well appointed stay! I would definitely stay again!
Very, very clean! Great location. Great value.
Deborah’s house was perfect for our stay in town! 5 minute drive to the Harper Event Venue, if anyone has a wedding to go to there! She was very clear and easy to coordinate with.
Very, very clean and quiet. Deborah was very accommodating and responsive to messages.
Great communication. Nice host. Pleasant stay. Accurate listing.
Deborah's place is perfect! She is so nice. Place is very comfortable, clean, safe, quiet. Our home away from home! Always superb!
Cozy and comfortable! Deborah is welcoming and very accommodating!
Debs place is always perfect. So cozy. Clean. Great location. Great hostess ! Always wonderful ! Thank you !

Deborah's home was amazing as always. We have stayed there many times and when we need a place in Meadville, we always check to see if she is available. The fireplace is so nice and cozy in the wintertime and the bed is very comfortable. Thanks Deborah for everything.
This is a beautifully decorated clean, warm, comfortable place to stay. Our hostess was friendly and accommodating.
Deborah is an excellent host. Both the host and the room were warm and inviting. Perfect after a long drive from Pittsburgh.
Her home is beautiful and there’s a fire place. Y’all! There’s a whole fire place. It randomly came on too, which scared me at first, but I did enjoy it. She is super nice!
Deb was a great communicator and gracious host. Her place was super cozy with everything we needed to feel right at home. Located in a beautiful neighborhood. Highly recommended.

It was a basement apartment. The room was about 25 by 15 with a separate bathroom and walk-in closet. WE used the separate entrance door that required walking around back. I think the garage was available, but we didn't need it. I think if you use the garage you can walk in and go straight downstairs. The place was very clean. Loved the bed! Very comfortable. There was a dehumidifier running full time, so there was no musky smell. The place is simply the best value if you are looking for a place to sleep and run around from. I will try and stay there again next time I am in the area. I would recommend it to anyone.
Only stayed overnight. Everything was clean and thoughtful touches throughout. Thank you!
Everything that’s described about the place is accurate. Amazing place!
Deborah was a very welcoming host and the studio suite she provided was cozy and accommodating. The only thing I wish I could have changed was sleeping in that bed more! So comfy.
Deborah is always prompt to respond and accommodating to requests. Great location across Allegheny athletic complex and only a short drive to campus and downtown.
Deborah's place was just as advertised. Clean and cozy and the perfect location for me to go see my nephew play football for the Gators.
This is a wonderful place to stay. The room is very spacious and has its own door. A refrigerator was provided and coffee if I wanted it.
Deborahs place is perfect! Great location for Allegheny College activities, clean, comfortable and great communication! Highly recommend!
Deborah was very accommodating and had a wonderful home. If ever in Meadville, I would be happy to book with her again.

Spacious, well-appointed location in a pleasant neighborhood. Great instructions, magazines to read, just about everything you could want in your own space. I definitely recommend this location.
The only item I can point out for other guests to consider if this may be an issue for you is that, being a basement apartment, you can hear just the regular walking about the house above you. This was not a problem for me but could be for others. Other than that, there is NO problem with noise as the neighborhood was very quiet.
Awesome location near the Allegheny College. Very clean and quiet. Felt more like home…. Very cozy!

We had a very comfortable and quiet stay at Deborah's. She greeted us personally and welcomed us to her well-maintained home, tastefully decorated with art and art pottery. The lower level was spacious, private and opened to a large rear yard with trees and birds a-plenty.
Deborah's house is conveniently situated and very easy to find from the freeway, straight into town on Park Ave and a right turn just past Allegheny's athletic field.
Great, comfy stay! I would recommend Deborah’s place to anyone staying in the area.
Very clean and comfortable. Just what I needed.
Close to Allegheny and sports fields. very convenient for parents visiting. Private and quiet area. Highly recommend. Deborah was in touch and responded quickly.

This was the perfect place for me to stay When I was

An apartment snuggled into the second floor with wonderful children’s stories on the shelf and if you as lucky as we were fresh baked goods to sample. Near (a good hilly walk) to the college and Lucy’s laundry. Don’t forget to visit Kettle Lake Kitchen for the best tasty food in Meadville (old Market House location).
both beds were made up, lovely fresh scones prepared, great breakfast, highly recommend

Excellent place to stay, in an upstairs apartment. It felt loved. Very well furnished in the kitchen (plates, bowls, mugs, glassware, flatware, pots & pans, etc.). We enjoyed with many good foods (fruit, oatmeal, etc.) and fixings for hot drinks that she left for us. We especially enjoyed the zucchini bread that Marion baked special for us. The microwave oven takes a bit longer to cook, due to lower Watts than at our house. The shower worked well, the bedroom was spacious with a bed light. We really appreciated the air conditioner in the living room. We also have This End Up couches at home, but this is the first one I've seen with a foldout bed. The garage supports charging up (slowly) our electric car, very handy.
A comfortable apartment in an old Victorian house. The best equipped kitchen and pantry we've ever seen in Airbnbs.

Marion is an excellent hostess. Inside the apartment was very tidy and clean. The entry and stairs were not as clean - so get inside before making judgement. It’s a simple apartment, just like advertised with quite a bit of room. AC kept us cool in July. Very comfortable all around.
Marion makes sure you have more than you need and it’s really appreciated.
Cute little apartment. Located within walking distance of Allegheny College. The space is basic, functional and clean.
A good place to stay
Easy to find, great amenities, heat in the winter :), responded very quick, left great choices for breakfast

Marion was a great host. A real mother's touch to the place, very clean and she always responded quickly. It was a pleasure to rent from her. Her efforts to make my stay the best it could be showed in every way. Very thankful.

Marion's place was perfect for our stay. The selection of breakfast options, the wifi, the location - all great. We appreciated having the garage to park in (and the salted/shoveled driveway and walkway) when it snowed. The apartment stayed warm and cozy, with comfortable beds and bedding. Not to mention the homemade baked goods! Highly recommended.
Good place to stay
Great communication, really lovely and good location
A cute little 1 bedroom flat with a small kitchen in an old Voctorian. Everything we needed for a short visit to check out the local college. Would stay again!
Cozy

Marion is very kind! She baked homedade muffins that were left in the fridge along with some other items for breakfast. She also was very friendly and talked with us both on our way in and out. The rooms were in an upstairs apt, so you do need carry items up a tight staircase. Older house so a little drafty but there were plenty of blankets. There is no tv, however there are a few books and games I loved all of the little touches in the kitchen that made the space feel homey. We had a lovely stay and would definitely stay again if we are in the area.
Marion had homebaked scones and other goodies for us. The space was comfortable, sort of European feel to it. Would definately go back.
Great location, very comfortable, super sweet special touches like homemade muffins as fresh a long drive and hot cocoa. Larger than expected.
Great place to stay near the college
Our stay was wonderful! Marion made us homemade scones for breakfast and the apartment was very comfortable. We definitely enjoyed our stay! 5 stars!!

Miss Marion was very sweet and excellent to work with! We were able to check in early so we could freshen up and get to a family wedding in town on time! The room would be perfect for a longer stay in town, or even for a student at Allegheny just up the hill!
What a nice, roomy place. Clean, well furnished, and breakfast!!! The steps are steep, but worth the walk up. Would gladly stay here again.
Basic clean place. Good value and location. Nicest owner. Thank you.
Beautiful and very comfortable historic apartment in the heart of Meadville, with many thoughtful touches. Thank you Marion!

As always , our stay here was superb! Marion is such a gracious host ! The apartment is always spotless and very well prepared ! And the treats are always appreciated. Thank you Marion ! See ya again !
Amazing

Marion’s place was spotless, easy to navigate and served our purpose. Marion was extremely communicative both before, during and after our stay. The breakfast items she had placed in our refrigerator shot the overall value of our stay out of the park! The only downside, by no fault of Marion’s, was the noise of the traffic both late night and early morning on the bypass nearby. I should have brought earplugs.

Marion was very welcoming and had a lot of local tips set out for us. The fresh blueberry scones was a thoughtful touch and she also had the kitchen very well stocked. 10 out if 10 we would stay there again.
Marion is very pleasant.. the house is beautiful and thr location is close to everything. We loved it and hated to leave
My mom had the most amazing experience. She enjoyed the shopping locally near by and how quiet it was there! Thank you for your hospitality and sharing your home with my mom!

Appreciated being able to park in the open garage. Those stairs up to the place are very narrow as stated—she wasn’t joking. The neighborhood is kinda rundown and the place is old but it’s clean and the continental breakfast items were a super-nice touch. Worth the price.
Older home. Stairs were steep as is described but hand rail was difficult to grip.
A fun, retro experience!

Marion was a wonderful host. She worked with us during a difficult family situation and was very helpful. She made sure that all our needs were taken care of and her house is conveniently located to everything in Meadville. I would highly recommend.

Marion is top notch! So kind! Very friendly! Great communication! This is our second stay in her apartment and we feel so comfortable there. Great location to Allegheny College. Ample space in the apartment. Great value! And let me tell you - the breakfast items provided are so VERY much appreciated! Muffins and scones are better than a downtown bakery! Thank you Marion! See ya again!!

Our stay was quite delightful!
All of the personal touches of milk, OJ, yogurt and muffins made our stay even better!
Marion is so easy to work with, and did so many thoughtful things for my stay. The place is exactly as described. I will come again.

Great location for an overnight before an Allegheny College visit - excellent value, too! The garage was spacious, and easy to park in. The place was just as described, and the directions for check-in easy to follow. Marion said hi as we were heading out for dinner (to a really great Italian place - Chovy's? - nearby). Bed was a little hard for our taste, but everything else was really comfortable. Marion provided us with scones, milk, cereal, coffee, oatmeal packets - more than we expected for an easy breakfast in the room. The place is small, as described, but thoughtfully arranged and quite comfortable. I'd go back in a heartbeat.

Marion's home is cool and kitchy and Marion is very warm and welcoming. We were so grateful and surprised by the wonderful cranberry scones, butter, two types of milk, orange juice, coffee, delicious yoghurt for every day we were scheduled to stay. Marion's home is in an area of fantastic, huge old homes. We cannot wait to return!
Very convenient location with lovely touches. Great communication and immaculate apartment. Highly recommend!
Great place!
It was a good place. She had everything covered and offered suggestions for restaurants locally
Great place
Great apartment super convenient to Allegheny College.

Marion is a wonderful hostess. Nice space with plenty of choices for breakfast food and snacks. Loved her homemade scones. Would definitely stay again.
Nice and cozy with everything you need.

Marion is so nice and everything was perfect from communication to the blueberry bread loaf homemade by the host I believe. The apartment is spotless and has a lot of character. We will definitely stay here again.
Great place for a good rest.
Best air bnb experience so far. Was pretty straight forward and easy.

The apartment is very neat and clean.You can put your vehicle in the garage and it only a short walk to the apartment. You have a kitchen, bathroom, livingroom and bedroom sleeps 4 and In a nice neighborhood.

Marion's place is perfectly situated btwn the Allegheny College campus and downtown Meadville - everything is in walking distance. I've stayed a few times at Marion's. I park my car in the provided garage space and leave it there until I'm ready to leave Meadville. Marion always leaves homemade fresh baked goods, all the coffee/tea supplies you need and other breakfast/snack food. This accommodation is very thoughtful. There are always extra towels and blankets, generous amounts of toilet paper. I've never felt that supplies are 'rationed'. We typically cook at least 1 meal/day during our stays. The kitchen has everything you need to cook basic meals. This is becoming out home away from home when in Meadville. Thanks Marion!

Marion's place is perfect for us when visiting our daughter at AC! The location is superb! Apartment is much larger than we anticipated and the extra space is a welcomed plus! Marion was very helpful with her excellent communication and kind greeting when we arrived. And most of all - the breakfast items, including homemade scones and muffins are TOP NOTH and appreciated! Thanks Marion. Hope to see you again!

This is a very nice quiet place to stay. All the practical essentials of a small apartment and thoughtful host. Perfect host to guest interaction. Plenty of room to relax and recover from a day of activity.
Great help, warm welcome, home baked blueberry scones!

This was my first Airbnb experience. If all hosts are like Marion, sign me up! The apartment was great. There were so many pluses: location is close to everything, very clean, super comfortable bed, lots of nice touches like snacks, juice, and filtered water. A total bonus were all of the breakfast items provided, especially the homemade scones! Marion was so nice, available but respectful of your space. I can't say enough good things about my weekend there. Thanks, Marion!

We had a lovely stay at Marion’s house. The location was perfect and she included some special touches that made the stay even more enjoyable. Her communication was timely and simple to understand. We would recommend staying here while in Meadville.

Marion’s Place is perfect for long stays or short! There is a little living room, a bedroom, a bathroom and a cute little kitchen with an eating bar! The place is very clean and is in a nice area of town, and everything was well thought out and taken care of. She provided a delicious breakfast, and was incredibly sweet to talk to you! I would definitely stay here again!
Nice clean quiet apartment in an old home, steep stairs to climb, so keep in mind, but garage parking, in a quiet neighbourhood. Will stay again
Marion is a great host who provides a comfortable place to stay and plenty of goodies for her guests.
You can expect great hospitality. A very clean apartment with everything you need. There are fairly steep narrow stairs to go up as it is an old house. You also get to park in a garage.
The house is old but clean. Breakfast was a thoughtful touch.
Marion has a nice apartment, provides snacks and breakfast and made wonderful muffins for us. We appreciated the little extras. It was as described and what we needed for our short stay.

We were very pleased with our stay with Marion. The rooms and bathroom were spotless and her hospitality unmatched in our stays on Airbnb. She met us and communicated well with us. I highly recommend!
Great proximity to the college

Had a great stay at Marion’s place and would recommend her place to others. Really enjoyed having coffee, fruit, and breakfast items available for us each morning. Walking distance to town and lots of places to eat. Marion is a great host and very hospitable.

A clean space in a historic home. It was exactly what our family needed for our stay in Meadville. I especially appreciate the local dining suggestions and the generous breakfast items left for us. Marion was very responsive.

Second time staying here...would be a few more when I’m in the area but she books up fast—and there’s a reason why: her place is great! Always clean, always a wonderful host. I’ll be back...if I can get in before she books up!!
Place was great, convenient location, great value!
Wonderful location, excellent communication, tidy with generous snack options!
Very convenient location. Much appreciated breakfast items. Very spacious apartment. Included garage parking! Comfy bed. Would highly recommend.
Everything is just like pictures. Great location near Allegheny college.

Older home, but quite comfortable, including thermostat. Host is thoughtful and responsive. Generously provided fruit for snacking and great breakfast items, with juice, coffee, and milk. Chobani yogurt (my favorite). Looking forward to our next trip!
Lovely spot near some of the tasty bits of Meadville! The breakfast Marion provides is lovely!

Marion’s place is clean and comfortable, and has all the necessary amenities. Good WIFI signal. She greeted us as we arrived and settled in. Was perfect for our brief overnight stay. Home baked goodies were a nice treat!

Marion’s place is in the heart of Meadville. Close to everything. Marion made us delicious pumpkin scones. We appreciated the extra touches of kindness. It was a great place for the my husband and two boys.
This home is exactly as described. It’s comfortable but not luxury very pleasant and close to the college
I don't have a lot of experience booking these, so it increased my level of trust in the reviews. This place was indeed very clean, and every detail is attended to.
The perfect stay for our weekend. Comfortable, convenient and plenty of space. Marion was a great host!

My husband and I loved our one night stay at the victorian house. It was very cute! Marion was very nice and kept us informed about parking and arrival. She gave us some tips on new places to try in Meadville, which was very kind. And she left us a variety of breakfast options, the scones she had when we were there were delicious! She made us feel very comfortable. Everything was clean and well prepared, and it was nice to know that she was closeby if we needed anything. Thanks for the great stay, Marion!

What a nice, clean place. Entrance way well lit. Nice to park in garage. Marion had beverages and many breakfast items out. Great communication (even reached out to me to let me know we left something behind). Bed was comfortable. Nice, easy drive to Erie. Would definitely stay here again.

Marion was absolutely wonderful. She allows you to park in the garage which really adds to how safe you feel at her Victorian house. She balances the perfect amount of support while not being overwhelming. When you arrive here, it will be around the side of the house and up a steep set of stairs. You have a small kitchenette which she includes several of the things that you would need in such as yogurt, milk, some fruit, and cereal. Fantastic choice for Voodoo brewery or commons and downtown. Great stay!

It suited our needs perfectly for our one night, brief stay. It was great to have all that we needed for breakfast (plus homemade scones!) available, as we were pressed for time. While it is an older apartment with a small kitchen, it is kept well cleaned and space is organized. Communication was great too.

This location is exactly as stated and is great having a garage for the vehicle and so close to town and still easy to the interstate. Comfortable and clean with lots of breakfast stuff and cooking items, cool old home! Marion was so friendly and kind, this is a great little spot for Meadville!

I was in town for a wedding, and Marion’s place was in very close proximity. My boyfriend and I appreciated the small touches and quiet space, although we weren’t able to find silverware to eat the lovely breakfast foods with.
Good value apartment with many thoughtful touches, including lots of breakfast food.

Great locations. Close to the Allegeny college. The kitchen is well furnished. It's very convenient to cook occasionally. The room is enough big, clean and good.
Marion is very kind and a good baker. She was very busy and took the time to cook us some really good snacks. My son likes to taste it. She gives me many advices. Great thanks. Hope to see you again.
Breakfast options were great. Very basic apartment but good for the price. Very clean.

Marion offers a pleasant and relaxing little apartment in Meadville. My family and I were in town for a wedding, and her apartment was perfect for us since it is centrally located, and it was a nice clean and quiet place to return to after the busyness of our days. She was attentive to our needs and even thoughtfully provided a nice little array of breakfast foods and snacks. Thank you Marion for helping our visit to Meadville go so smoothly, and helping us feel comfortable in a home away from home!
Wonderful host, after arrival and check in instructions Marion greeted us and offered fresh cut watermelon. :-) very clean, feels like home away from home. Thanks you, Marion!

It’s more like the feel of a motel. I travel extensively and that’s what it felt like to me — solid but very basic. Unlike most hotels, however, Marion provided wonderful homemade bread and great breakfast options in the fridge.
It’s clean and the thoughtful touches for breakfast are wonderful. Marion is a wonderful host.

My wife and I have never used AirBnB, so to say we were skeptical is an understatement. However, we could not have had a more perfect first experience. Marion made sure everything was a breeze from check-in, snacks (scones, juices, milk, and water), recommendations in the area, and just a friendly chat. Marion’s place is perfectly situated to the point that walking to Meadville is both easy and enjoyable. The apartment was absolutely spotless. If we ever find ourselves back in the area, we will definitely take advantage of Marion’s hospitality and amenities again!

Nice to have a garage to park in, with unpacking and packing, we didn’t have to really worry about rain or snow. Marion had breakfast foods and drinks provided. We had to get to an event early so that was especially helpful to get us there on time. Very clean and nice space to stay. We loved it and recommend this place with 5 stars!
Marion is a wonderful host! Loved the scones and breakfast provided!

Marion’s place was exactly as stated and even more. The house says it is old and while that’s true, Marion had touches in the apt that were perfect for our stay. The place was clean, banana chocolate chip bread, fruit, yogurt, coffee etc in the fridge as well as other breakfast foods available. This was great for us so we didn’t need to rush out and find breakfast. Fresh flowers were nice too. We were able to put our car in the garage and it was rainy so appreciated that. Great value, close to town where we went to have dinner.
The apartment is amazingly cozy, I like the layout. Unlike places of this day and age. Would surely stay again when coming by this way!

Good value, cozy place, the continental breakfast was very nicely done and a nice treat during our stay. Comfortable and basically as advertised.

Great location...Marion is a sweetheart!

What can I say other than this place is perfect. Marion offers all you could ask for and then some. I forgot a ziplock bag for some of my food to store and she even had those for us to use! Treats in the fridge were an added touch which we loved. The place was clean and oh so cute. It was perfect for our visit to Allegheny college and if I become an Allegheny Mom, you can bet I’m going to look to stay here again. Thanks for a wonderful stay-you’re truly a gem!
Nice, clean, comfortable place. Bed was very comfy . Large selection of breakfast stuff. Nice to have a garage to park your car in. Marion was a wonderful host.
Cozy and accommodating, comfy bed!!

Marion is a delightful host and her space is amazing. The bed was comfortable, the space was spacious, super clean and there were lots of great breakfast items in the refrigerator. Great location if visiting Allegheny College.
Very good
Great communication with our unexpected change in plans! ...was glad to hear Marion came out to greet my future daughter in law when she arrived. Marion is a great hostess

There is no television or toiletries — not a criticism, just an FYI to pack accordingly. But if you forget anything or want to cook, local grocery stores are nearby. The hosts welcomed us with a personal handwritten note, which was a nice touch.
Our visit was short (eclipse weekend!) and we spent much of our time out of the house, which is why my review is short. We enjoyed our stay.

This was the perfect place to hang out with co-teachers over a teachers conference weekend. Very gorgeous and welcoming space. Lots of updated features to a very uniquely old house. Thanks for the cookies and the other accommodations!
great place, will book again.

This was our second time staying here and it was great. Our son is a student at Allegheny and this is the perfect place to relax as a family while visiting! Thank you...we plan to come back many times over the next four years.

I lived just a couple blocks aways from this home over a decade when I went to Allegheny College. This Airbnb was absolutely perfect! Very cozy, yet spacious. Incredibly clean and homey. I hope to book this home for a longer stay when I return to Meadville next fall!

The house was beautiful!! Everything was just as described on the listing. Lots of room and space in the living space to eat and hang out together while at the same time allowing privacy with multiple bedrooms and bathroom. will definitely come back !

The place was very homey! We stayed here to move our daughter into college at Allegheny. It is a little more than a 10 minute walk to campus but still very easy to get there. We can’t say enough about this wonderful place! Better than the pictures even! VERY spacious and VERY clean! The hosts were super kind and accommodating! I thought we would be lost not having a TV there but they had lots of toys for my 4yo and many games and puzzles for us which was just what we needed! We connected and where unplugged for those few days! It was perfect! My teenagers didn’t even mind not watching the tube! It was a quiet neighborhood which made it easy to relax. I would say bring your lawn chairs and sit out by the fire pit. We didn’t bring any and they offered us theirs!! So sweet!! Unlike some Airbnb’s where you have to bring your own TP and bedding, Townhouse on Lord had everything you need and so neatly organized! We had a wedding so really have no need to go back there BUT might make up a reason just to stay again!! It was incredibly enjoyable and we wish we could’ve stayed longer!

We truly enjoyed our experience while in Meadville this past week. Bill B. - Montrose, Colorado
Very nice place to stay

Great spot. No central air but 3 wall units that make it plenty cool enough on a hot day. There are no tvs in the house but it was very cozy and welcoming.

Such a great location for anyone visiting Meadville. The downtown area is an easy 10-15 min walk and the home is on a quiet street. Everything was very clean and organized in the home and we could not have asked for a better stay.
This was a welcomed and comfortable respite during our visit. Great setting and would definitely revisit again next time in the area.
We were very satisfied with the place. The best thing about the place was that it was very kid friendly. Kids loved the toys and the hammock.

The "Townhouse on Lord" struck the perfect balance between simplicity and homey. It was immaculately clean yet it still felt cozy, with bookshelves and plants. The hosts thought of everything, even having cookies at the house when we arrived.
We were in town for Allegheny's graduation. We loved that this beautiful home was walking distance from campus, yet also on a quiet, peaceful street!
Great place to stay. Host was very communicative and everything was exactly as advertised. Some homemade cinnamon rolls and a nice note we’re there on arrival. Recommend to all
Beautiful location and house.

Only wish we had more time to spend there. I'd be willing to bet the fall colors in those incredible woods would be incredible.

A gem of a home on a beautiful property. I stayed a long weekend with my husband and three friends during the eclipse. All around a great stay.

Beautiful cabin! Perfect for a few days away with colleagues. The fireplace, living space was amazing for conversation, games, and relaxing. Perfect example of higher end B and B cabins. Wonderful experience and highly recommend.
Great stay!

Wonderful Host. Only downside was internet and phone service was not good. We couldn’t connect phones or laptops and cell service kept going to SOS. We enjoyed the fireplace and having Christmas morning in front of the fireplace was amazing!

Our family enjoyed the serene isolated property. Lots of room to run around for the kids, indoors and out. They have baby gates and loads of other awesome amenities. A great little get away !! We’ll be back !

We had a wonderful time at the cabin! It was quiet, peaceful, and relaxing! Beautiful space to walk and explore outside, too! Host was super responsive if we needed anything! We will be back to stay again!

What an incredibly beautiful location and house! We really appreciated the stories you shared about the history of this house and family retreat. Hiking around the pond and in the woods provided us with a peaceful and energetic weekend. We certainly would love to return here someday. Thanks!
We rented the airbnb for a "get ready" house prior to my wedding. This house is beautiful inside and out. Clean, plenty of space, just wonderful. We would rent it again and again!

Just a Wonderful place to spend time with the Family. When you learn about the family and how the property was built , it will make sense why . Chad was a perfect responsive host . Beautiful property! Very clean and well maintained. Perfect for our stay and near to where we needed to be but quiet and peaceful area. I would definitely recommend for a get away!
Thank you for sharing our home with us! It was the absolute best weekend being together as a family :) your cabin felt so cozy and the property is beautiful!

Every amenity was provided: fully-appointed and well-stocked kitchen, ample outdoor seating, and an inviting firepit set within the trees. We were able to have a very relaxing and peaceful family getaway. I imagine the property would be breathtaking in the fall with the changing of the leaves. We all loved it so much we hope to return next year!
We had a wonderful time. The photos were exactly what was there. Everything was perfect. We will definitely be back again.
Exceeded our expectations. Plan to stay there again in the future. Beautiful property with a cool family history. Well worth the price!

We couldn’t have been happier with this place! The cabin itself is amazing, and the property is unbelievable. It is so peaceful and quiet. I can’t say enough good things about this cabin! It was absolutely perfect! It is a must see and stay. 10/10 would recommend!

The cabin is absolutely stunning!

It is very peaceful.
We walked the property and saw deer and we spent some time at the pond and saw fish and baby newts in the pond.
This cabin and property is Heaven on earth.
We had the best time and hope to rent it again in the future.

What an outstanding place to visit if you are traveling with family! We stayed for 2 nights, as a family member was getting married at the Harper Event Center. Owner is highly responsive and informative. Great neighborhood. Quiet and serene. We will definitely be back for a family get away in the future!!!! Thanks Ryan!!!
Just as advertised. Nice spot for a family. Kids loved the basement!

Serenity Escape in Meadville, PA is a wonderful place to stay. We stayed here for a graduation. The host (Ryan) was super responsive and friendly. The house is in a quiet neighborhood, not too far from downtown Meadville. The house is super spacious and comfortable. It was perfect for our family.
