Good location, lots of space. Pretty well equipped. Responsive host, and good value in the winter. Many things have not been touched or changed in years, so it is a bit of a museum.
Perfect location and enough space for my family. Very helpful with checking in from coming out of town. Will definitely be coming back.

Incredibly spacious home that can accommodate a large group. Ryan was very responsive to questions. It was in a great location for us as we were visiting family for the holidays. I’d love to visit again during the summer and be able to use the pool!

Used as sleeping overflow while visiting relatives for Thanksgiving. Place was clean. Beds were comfortable. Kitchen well stocked. Plenty of room for our family of four (there was an entire area downstairs we didn't even enter). It was November so pool/outside patio were closed for season but looked like it would be a great place to visit in summer. Will definitely book again next time visiting.

We had a great stay at Ryan’s place! Easy check-in process and everything was as described! We were attending a wedding at the Harper event center just down the road so this spot was very convenient for us!
We needed a place to hang out with our son thats in college in the area, this place was perfect for us. Easy to find and check in.
I loved the back deck! Perfect place to have some of my daughter wedding pictures taken.
Great place! Will stay again when we return

The home is on a quiet culdesac. The beds are comfortable. the kitchen was well stocked. there was a nice amount of towels. the only complaint we have was the over abundance of glassware and the lack of dinnerware. but over all a great place to stay. would book again if in area.
Ryan always was available to us. So kind and friendly. The pool was great and the kids really enjoyed it. It was convenient to the town of Meadville and still felt that you were away from it all.
The pool was incredible and the place was very clean. They had a large amount of towels which was very nice since we were there for several nights and didn’t have time to do laundry!
Pool and back deck area was awesome. So quiet and peaceful for a getaway. Has a gazebo, swing, and plenty of chairs by the pool. Even has an umbrella that goes over one end of the pool.

Very nice house . Was there for sons wedding at the Harper Event center . i could not have ask for a closer more convenient Home . very clean nice pool great home away from home for wedding weekend . One note is decor just little .... there is dated christmas decor everywhere just gave us weird vibes BUT AMAZING RENTAL FOR MOST PART !!!!!
Ryan was a wonderful host and was very responsive. We already want to book the house again for our vacation next year.
The house is beautiful. Our children enjoyed the pool. We were worried about all the fancy decorations but everything worked out for our family. The neighborhood was nice and appeared safe .
As described, clean, and overall a great stay.
Had a wonderful stay. Do it again

This was the best, cleanest, friendliest Airbnb that I have stayed in. I have used Airbnb in Clifornia, Oregon, Texas, and Italy. This one stands out as the best. Ryan was most accomodating and an excellent host. I give this place my highest reccomendation, and hope to stay here again when visiting my daughter.

We had a wonderful stay for our wedding weekend! The host was right next door and introduced themselves and assured us it was ok to contact them if we needed anything. The space was so nice and clean and the pool was amazing!

We stayed at Ryan's place for our daughter's medical school graduation. We felt right at home during our 3 night stay. The home so nice, clean and spacious and the outdoor space and use of bbq was enjoyable on a warm spring day. The kids loved the heated pool. Ryan was super responsive with any questions we had.

If we would need to stay in the area again we would stay at Ryan’s house. We felt at home there, cozy, friendly - a good to place unwind. We were super busy due to a wedding and would have liked to been able to enjoy the house more. Great place
Ryan's house was great. There was abundant space for my kids to play and a lot of old school toys which my kids loved. We'll definitely book again if we're in town.
Scenic and quiet setting on serene cul de sac, with very comfortable beds and great layout.

Super clean, super large home with a wonderful host. We stayed during the winter so didn't have the advantage of the lovely pool and deck. Hosts were prompt with communication. Located on a quiet residential street that's safe for kids to play. Will be reserving this location again!
Great place, hope to stay there again! Very easy to work with, quick responses. House was very clean😊

This is a great place in a quiet, walkable neighborhood and close to anything you’d want to do in the Meadville area. It was spotlessly clean, well stocked and very comfortable. We didn’t get to enjoy the pool because it was December, but maybe we’ll get a chance to come back in the summer. Ryan is next door and very responsive, but we didn’t need anything because he’d already taken care of everything.

My family of five stayed here for Thanksgiving while visiting my in-laws. It was a perfect rental for us. The house is spacious and clean. The location is central to everything and the neighborhood is lovely. The host is easy to communicate with and helpful and check-in/out is convenient. We plan to stay here again on our next visit to town.
This place was great for us while visited family in the area. It was SUPER clean! The kids enjoyed having TVs in every room! Ryan was an excellent host!
Beautiful place to stay. Everything was great and will definitely book again when in the area

This was our 2nd time staying at Edgewood! We recommend it if you enjoy being away from street noises but also only 5 min from town :D
We really enjoyed the electric fireplace vibes for evenings and the individual room AC units kept the whole place at the cooler temperature we love 💘
Clean and comfortable with spacious rooms. Elizabeth was very responsive in communication. Everything is exactly as pictured and described.
Would be our first choice if we are in the area again 👍👍

We had traveled to Meadville to be in the path of totality for the solar eclipse while avoiding a major metropolitan area. Elizabeth's Edgewood Guesthouse was the ideal location for the viewing and the weather cooperated. The guesthouse was comfortable, clean, and close to downtown Meadville where we found restaurants and some local events associated with the eclipse. We enjoyed our stay.

Wonderful experience! It was exactly as pictured, and Elizabeth is a great communicator and host. I appreciate the installation of the keypad to allow for self-check-in, especially as I was delayed and arrived later in the day.
There is so much to love about this gem in a small town. My favorite features were the electric fireplace and the AC/Heaters in each room. Having individual control in the bedrooms is a great option.
The Kitchen was fully stocked, which I appreciated! Overall, the home feels spacious and minimal yet warm, and it is like a home.
I plan to return as it is only 5 min from Allegheny College, which makes visiting my Gator very easy.

We had an absolutely amazing time staying here for our wedding weekend. The house was clean and the pictures don’t do it justice for just how spacious it is. If you are planning to have your wedding at the Harper we definitely recommend here as a place for you and your fiancé or wedding party!

The house is beautiful but could use better cleaning as far as under beds, baseboards, things like that.
It's extremely dark in the area and the house could use a motion activated light. The lockbox seemed to be in an odd location esp with how dark it is there. There is nothing much in the immediate area so plan accordingly! The space in the home was well decorated.

Overall it was a great place to stay. This home is clean, spacious, and comfortable. Adam and Kaitlyn were very responsive to our messages both leading up to our stay and during our stay. We did have to contact them when we arrived because we hadn’t received the code for the lockbox. They responded quickly and we were able to get right in. One thing we would recommend to folks that are planning on staying here is you should grab some drinking water before you get there because the water smells like sulfur. Keep in mind that there is an additional cleaning fee if you have visitors, which was not mentioned in the booking process.

The home was beautiful and peaceful. Unfortunately we were in town for a funeral, but the location was conveniently located close to the where the services were held and family. It was a great respite for a few days and just the right size for my family. They were quick to respond when I requested to extend my stay. I would rent again.
Super responsive host! Accommodated our busy, changing schedule in a very friendly fashion!
Nice place , matched the description. Very friendly hosts .

Adam and Kaitlyn were wonderful hosts. The pictures really don’t do the space justice; it is so spacious and the perfect spot for a young family. They had personalized touches and were extremely responsive
Their place fit our needs perfectly. Convenient location. Thank you! A+++++

Beautiful, clean and updated house. ! Tastefully decorated w thought put into details. Perfect for my family of 6 as we came to the area for our daughter's wedding; extremely convenient, 8 min from wedding venue. The 4 bedrooms gave the perfect amt of privacy . The kitchen was immaculate and a bonus was the fully stocked laundry room w ironing supplies. Loved the entry / mudroom, a great place to organize your grab and go supplies.
Caveats: the step from the mud room up into the house was a little high for my elderly mom. Hand rails would have been helpful for stairs too .
Wish we would have been able to hang at the house longer ( nice large family room for conversations) but was ideal for what we needed; family coming from 3 diff states for wedding. Super responsive, accommodating hosts! Recommend!

I would definitely stay here again! We were in town for a wedding and the house accommodated our family perfectly. We could relax in the spotless home and beautifully manicured lawn instead of being confined to a hotel room which made our weekend much more pleasurable.
We didn’t have time to explore the town of Meadville but did grab some lunch at The Whole Darn Thing sub shop and they were hands down the best we’ve ever had! Very cute town and definitely worth returning so we can explore more.
Thanks for being responsive hosts and providing such a beautiful place to stay. And for the extra special touches🥰

We had a wonderful stay. The home is located just 5 minutes from the Harper Event Center where our son got married. We were able to be together with our immediate family for this occasion and we all had a great time! Thank you!
awesome place, food hosts

This lovely home looks better than the photos and feels much bigger too. It is peaceful, welcoming, clean and comfortable. My daughter and her bridesmaids relaxed before the wedding with movies and girl time- they called the home perfect and dreamy! It was so much better than a hotel. They loved it!! The hand written note and details were thoughtful and personalized. My husband saw it and would love to go back again. Thanks for a lovely weekend, it could not have been better.
Great place, would definitely recommend!

Adam and Kaitlyn’s place was absolutely perfect for my daughter’s wedding in Meadville! I loved how bright and airy everything was! It was beautiful and just like the pictures! We had some last minute changes and Kaitlyn was immediately responsive and accommodating. The town was only 5 minutes away. We will definitely stay there again next time we are in Meadville.
We had a family reunion in the area and 8 of us stayed in this house. It was a great space with an open concept. It was very clean and the decorating looked new. I would stay here again!

We had several family members coming into town for a wedding. The cottage was only 7 minutes from the venue and offered a relaxing and comfortable atmosphere for our families to make lasting memories. We had a few questions upon our arrival, the hosts answered immediately. The cottage was recently renovated and was updated beautifully. The beds were comfortable and freshly cleaned. Because the kitchen was stocked with all the basic items needed, we enjoyed several home cooked meals. We also enjoyed using the grill and fire pit (they provide wood). The cottage doesn't have central air but the two window units and fans seemed adequate for our stay. There was plenty of parking for our multiple cars as well. We highly recommend and would stay here again if we are ever in the area.

My family stayed at Adam and Kaitlyns place while visiting family in the area this past week. We were very comfortable in their home. It was like home away from home. The place was clean and spotless and they had everything we needed. I was concerned when I realized they didn’t have central air conditioning but a window unit in the upstairs bedroom and one on the main floor. But to my surprise, we were very comfortable both day and night with the temperatures outside in the mid eighties the entire time we stayed in their home. THANK YOU, Adam and Kaitlyn for opening your beautiful home to us so we could continue making new memories.

The hosts were extremely helpful and willing to accommodate to our needs. We used this as a bridal suite for our bridesmaids to stay and as a place to host dinner for the bridal party and it worked perfectly. There were even little additions to the space to make it feel more like home such as unique firestarters on the kitchen table. Beautiful set up and mud room!
We had a great stay at this home. Perfect for our family of 6 plus 2 grandparents. Thank you!

Lovely space to stay, very accessible and easy to get to, get in, etc. Very kind and responsive hosts, comfortably slept 9 of us with no issues. Lovely decor and cute little firestarters for the campfire! Only very small issue was that there were only 2 bathrooms with 9 of us and we couldn't shower all of us in a timely manner/without running out of hot water, but with some planning, we were fine and it was still worth the stay! Definitely recommend.

It was hot and humid that weekend and Central Air Conditioning would have been nice. Upstairs bedroom stayed cool with window AC unit, but just one small AC unit to cool the whole downstairs was not enough. Back bedrooms stayed very warm and muggy. Downstairs bedrooms could really use window unit. Otherwise, very nice home with all the amenities and very clean.
This house was perfect for the night before a wedding nearby at The Harper. Everyone had a comfortable place to sleep and the kitchen was a perfect hangout spot.

Perfect stay for group of friends in town for an Allegheny reunion. The house was clean, comfortable, and in a great location for our needs. Loved being able to start the day with a cup of coffee outside, enjoying the birds and other wildlife. Kaitlyn was very responsive and accommodating, would definitely stay here again.

What a charming jewel! We stayed here for our daughter’s graduation from Allegheny College. The house was close enough and was convenient to drive to and from. We arrived late, but it was easy to check in, and the house made us smile from the second we walked in. It was so clean and had all the things we needed- to include a wine opener and coffee for the morning. We went outside to have a glass of wine after a long drive, and were amazed at the cacophony of magical nature sounds coming from the bullfrogs and birds. When we went back inside, however, it was quiet and relaxing. I only wish we had discovered this home earlier in our journeys. Thank you for a wonderful stay.
Very nice place. Clean and well-stocked. We enjoyed our time there, would stay again when traveling to Meadville in the future. Thank you!

Our family enjoyed our stay in Adam and Kaitlyn's home. The space is as advertised - clean, comfortable, and a great place to relax after a long day. They were always responsive too which was very helpful.
We had a weekend event to attend in Meadville and the place was perfect for our needs.

Adam and Kaitlyn’s home is beautiful, clean, modern and spacious. Everything was as described in the listing, the home was very comfortable and well appointed for our short stay. Our group of 3 families with small children had plenty of room for dinner, games and crafts. Everyone slept comfortably and checkout was easy. My only complaint is that the lighting throughout the kitchen, dining and living room areas are super bright and kind of harsh first thing in the morning. The only floor lamp in the living room was burnt out, so an additional low light source or a hall nightlight would’ve been clutch, but other than that everything was great!
Very comfortable and cozy. Very satisfied with our time spent here and would highly recommend anyone looking for a peaceful stay. Would definitely book again in the future.

We highly recommend these hosts and this house. Adam and Kaitlyn were very accomodating and exceeded our expectations. Under the tough circumstances we were faced with during our stay, you were very flexible and understanding. Thank you

While initially I wanted to leave them a good review, my thoughts have changed based on how we were treated after our stay. Things were going great in the beginning, however, upon leaving the house and driving back to Ohio, I was greeted with a message two days later at 5pm saying that my group violated house rules due to their cleaning lady finding pet hair. For some context, myself, as well as the other guests have pets at home, and most of us work at a small animal vet clinic. Based on this information, pet hair will inevitably travel with us. Not only did we find accommodations to have our pets watched in our home state 3.5 hours away, one guest has a service dog and elected not to bring him based on house rules and the fact that there would be 4 other people to help her if needed. When I got the first message this evening (10/18/22 at 3:30pm) I was told that we violated house rules and that the cleaning lady had to actually clean the house instead of apparently just doing a spot clean. So not only were we wrongly accused, but it seems as though they don't launder the blankets and sheets on a regular basis? Safe to say we will not be staying at their house in the future due to this experience.
Nice house and location. Not far from the town, yet secluded in a nice neighborhood. The layout of the house is open and spacious. Wonderful space to relax with modern upgrades.

We enjoyed our stay. Plenty of space, newly remodeled, and comfortable. Nice fire pit and a grill. The sulphur smell in the water noted in two prior reviews was still an issue for us, despite the responses that the water filtration has been fixed. We used bottled water for cooking, washing vegetables, or drinking, so we went through a lot of bottled water. I’m not commenting on health and safety, but the sulphur smell was unpleasant.

This is a sparkling clean and spacious home conveniently located just south of Edinboro and an hour drive to Erie. We appreciated the kitchen basics and the ample supply of towels. There's also plenty of easy parking for 2-4 cars. The only downside for was a lack of dressers and tabletop space in all the bedrooms and bathrooms. We stayed in the area for a wedding and would have appreciated more space to better unpack and organize ourselves. You should also know the home uses well water. This isn't a big deal, but it's worth noting in case you want to buy water in advance.

We went to meet friends and it was spacious and comfortable. Also, the house might be on well water as the water had a smell to it so bring drinking water. However I absolutely loved the updated everything. Thanks for having us.

I would recommend this property to whom ever would ask. Really clean
and quiet. Beds were comfortable.

You can't go wrong with this cottage, clean and accurate as described in the listing. Perfect location for those with plans around Meadville town or Allegheny college. Perfect for large families get together. The amenities offered/included in the cottage worked out well for us. Rented it out for 4 days when dropping our son to College and will definitely rent it out again if needed.

Loved our stay! Adam and Kaitlyn's place was clean, spacious and comfortable. The layout is open and perfect for a large group. I loved the house plants throughout the house that thrive because the house gets a lot of sun. There is very little traffic on the road and it is very peaceful. Newly renovated and landscaped, it is very welcoming. The kitchen is stocked with plenty of dishes and glassware. We didn't do any cooking while we were there but it seemed like there was everything you could need! Easy check-in and great communication with the hosts. My family fell in love with the area! Great find!! Thank you Adam and Kaitlyn!
This was a truly restful retreat weekend! The owners have done a beautiful job of renovation to this perfectly appointed home!
Very clean, cozy and beautifully decorated. We loved everything about it! Excellent communication!
Cute place.. newly renovated

Wind in the Willows Cottage was absolutely perfect and met all of our needs for a staff retreat (5 people). Adam & Kaitlyn were incredibly kind and easy to work with and went above and beyond to accommodate for an early check-in and late check-out (and a date change!). The space was inviting, cozy, and provided plenty of space for us to work and relax!
Great spot - beautiful scenery, ample sleeping space that doesn’t cost an arm and a leg!

Adam and Kaitlyn were as amazing as their home. This was my first experience with an Airbnb. We decided Meadville PA was the half way point between our friends in NJ and us from Indiana. We were super happy with the communications of Adam and Kaitlyn , the beautiful home they let us stay in, along with the town of Meadville.
Adam and Kaitlyn were super responsive from the beginning of our booking to the end our stay. Any questions we had were answered quickly.
The home itself it’s absolutely beautiful and you can still smell the newness of their remodel they did to the house. We needed a place the slept our two families a group of 10. After looks at halfway point this was our selection. It had plenty of space for everyone. We felt the home was very specious. You can tell they put a lot of work into the remodel. We went and googled the address. Google still had a picture of what it looked like before the remodel was done. So it was actually cool to see kinda before and after pictures.
Amenities:
We used the grill once to make some cheeseburgers and it worked well. Had to start it with a lighter, but that was provided at the house. The inside of the house had plenty of room for the kids to play. We also bought toys for the yard which has a lot of space to play. Kaitlyn and Adam were kind to turn on the water so we could fill a small kiddie pool up with water. We used the fire pit two of the nights and made s’mores. Kaitlyn and Adam have a great stock pile of wood to use, so you don’t have to go hunting firewood and are able to enjoy the fire pit right away.
The Town:
The town of Meadville actually was really nice. Restaurants, good coffee shop, farmers market (on saturdays), and little shops all within 5-10 minute drive. We really enjoyed the restaurant Julian’s and the French Roast coffee shop.
Thank you Adam and Kaitlyn for letting us stay at your home. We made some great memories.
Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the area!

Adam and Kaitlyn are considerate, attentive hosts and this place is clean as a whistle and very accommodating! It is tasetfully decorated and has everything you need for a peaceful, restful, overnight stay.

Adam and Kaitlyn have a beautiful house in a quiet location. Their house is tastefully arranged and decorated. There are many thoughtful touches from a fire ring and firewood to nice house plants. The kitchen has everything we needed, and we enjoyed cooking there. Also, everything is new as the house is newly remodeled. The house is bit far away from center Meadville but is very near to Tamarack Lake.

Elizabeth's French Creek Haven was exactly what we looked for and needed for our visit to Meadville for my 50th College Reunion at Allegheny College. It was bright and clean and just 7 minutes away, by car, from our event. What I liked best was the bed in the main bedroom (didn't try the other bed). I slept wonderfully well the several nights I was at Elizabeth's 'F.C.H.' Thanks Elizabeth !
Elizabeth’s place is very homey, clean and well maintained. We enjoyed a comfortable stay here, perfect for the weekend.

Super cozy space with nice decor and no extra clutter.
Main bed is super comfortable.
Only negative I noted (which is not the fault of the host) is the street noise can be loud in main bedroom. They provided a noise machine we used and we were so tired it wasn’t really an issue for us. No dishwasher, so be prepared to clean your dishes with provided supplies or bring paper.
Would rebook if we are ever in the area again!
Elizabeth's place was great. Everything we needed was provided.
Clean, clear instructions, great location (quick zip up to the College). Will definitely stay there again!
We came up for the Eclipse. It was a great place to come back to after a day of exploring. Really close to down town.
Nice place perfect for our hockey weekend. Close to a lot of great restaurants and not to far from the arena!
Very comfortable and exactly as described. Short drive to pretty much everything. Elizabeth is a great and very responsive host. Will definitely try and stay here again next time we’re up there.
It was very nice and would definitely go back.

Elizabeth was wonderful to work with. I wished to arrive very early Friday morning to beat the snowstorm, and Elizabeth was very accommodating. Space was a good fit for my group of three. The apartment is part of a duplex, and at first it was a little hard to tell which door to use. The duplex "neighbor" came out and cleared our deck and steps of snow several times throughout the weekend. Because of the weather, we mostly stayed indoors, but we did enjoy the walking trail between the river and the train tracks.
Great place to stay for a work trip. Easy to find. Great host!
My stay was wonderful as always.

My stay was fantastic as usual. Elizabeth puts a little extra thought into everything. This stay she left me a drink with a bow and note saying, it happened to be a favorite drink of her husband and herself. It was in fact good. It’s the little things in life really. I didn’t expect it but it’s kind and that means something.

Traveling Nurse: The accommodations were great and handy to the facility I’m currently contracted through. I will definitely stay again when it’s available. Only disadvantage is the microwave is kept on top of the refrigerator and I am short. After being on my feet all day for work (12hr shifts), climbing on a chair to use the microwave would probably end badly for me. BUT it’s definitely not enough issue to not return for another stay. The place is just as clean as I had hoped and I am particular about clean 🤭. Thank you very much for the wonderful place to sleep!
Perfect as always and can’t wait to stay again.
We had a wonderful stay! The apartment was so cute and very comfortable! We appreciated the little extras too, like the selection of card games, and the homemade treats!
Great place that is relaxing and close to whatever you would need; restaurants that deliver, grocery stores, pharmacy, clothing store right next door.

Elizabeth is a very nice and friendly host, always responsive and willing to share things and information. I do have a really great stay in the apartment, and there is no doubt the brownie made by Elizabeth is the one of my favorite, ever! Thank you Elizabeth!
Very comfy and cozy with so many amenities within walking distance.
I loved staying here! Super cozy, incredibly easy and private. Elizabeth was so responsive and helpful, we had a great time. And we had little towel animals! Above and beyond.
Great place to stay! Elizabeth was a great host. The home was spotless, beds were super comfortable, and the cookies she made were delicious!
Perfect stay! Very clean, well stocked and comfy bed! Thanks so much for taking our reservation with such late notice!

Very quiet place with a nice living room to hangout with family and friends. Boot box next door was nice to walk to and look around. It was a little chilly so I bought an Ariat hoodie for $30 which was a good price. Would definitely stay again.

This home was nicely decorated, and our family of 6 enjoyed our stay! We were in town to visit friends so we weren’t at the house during the day, but the evening and sleeping accommodations were perfect.
Elizabeth is a great host, very responsive and though of every little detail in the house. Location is very close to everything.

We very much enjoyed our stay. From the cookies that were left for us to the super fast wifi, everything was great. There were little nice things like the towels were folded to look like an elephant and there were Q-tips in the bathroom. There were cookies left for us as well.
We'd very much like to return.
It was exactly as presented. Elizabeth was easy to communicate with and the place was clean and updated.
Very homey, clean and cozy! I will recommend this place!

The host was extremely responsive. The apartment was well situated with easy access to all parts of town. Not only was the apartment clean, but Elizabeth left friendly little touches, like cookies, throughout. Very warm and cozy.
Nice comfy place to stay.
Cute, clean, easy access to campus. My 18yr old loved the little cookies left by Elizabeth when we arrived :)

Elizabeth is an amazing hostess! Her communication was second to none. As soon as we walked in we were greeted by a pristinely maintained, very clean, fresh scents, and just the right amount of technology (smart tvs and ~300 Gbps internet). The air conditioning is AMAZING! I am perpetually hot and the central air, not window units, deserves 5 stars by itself!
Finally we accidentally left a pillow that wasn’t cheap but more importantly is key for my wife to get a good nights sleep. Normally we would not have seen it again. However, Elizabeth contacted us, went out of her way to arrange for our friends to pick it up for us. It may seem small but what she did meant the world to us.
We would definitely stay again, but next time we will triple check to make sure we don’t leave anything behind! 😁
Comfy and cozy place
This is a welcoming cozy place to stay. Elizabeth responds quickly and is a joy to work with. We loved our time there. Everything we needed was provided and prepared for us! Highly recommend!
Easy to find. Just as described. I thoroughly enjoyed my time.

French Creek Haven was just as wonderful as described in the listing. Comfortable for 3 people but would potentially be tight for more than 4. Elizabeth was a very hospitable host, going out of her way to be sure we had enough linens and bringing cookies when she replaced our supplies. I would definitely stay here again!

We loved our stay at Elizabeth's apartment. It was sparkling clean, bright and quiet. The apartment was well equipped with everything we needed for our weekend visit. Elizabeth provided excellent instructions every step of the way. This will definitely be our go to home when visiting the Meadville area.
Host was very nice and let us check in a little early. The place was very cute and cozy!
Great host. Nice apartment. Well equipped kitchen, which was nice for a weekend College visit!

We enjoyed our stay so much and felt ready to move in because it was just so cute! The place was very comfortable and cozy. There are several stairs so I wouldn’t recommend to anyone with mobility issues. Otherwise, I highly recommend this apartment!
Lovely home within walking distance of downtown Meadville. I'd definitely stay again.
Nice place
Amazing experience easy entry and simple communication
Absolutely perfect for what we wanted! Comfortable and cute!!
Liz is an excellent host; very quick to answer any questions we had. The space was clean and inviting, the beds were super comfortable, and the bathroom had a great shower. Would stay again!
A great host and place!
Amazing place to stay! Would recommend.
this place was perfect for a weekend stay. very clean, plenty of room and a great location close to the college. Communication was excellent. Would stay there again.
I
Great host and location!

My husband and I came here right after our wedding. This cabin was perfect for relaxation and for remembering and locking in all the highlights of our wedding. We sat out on the porch as much as possible, enjoyed the hot tub and fire pit. I also enjoyed the gas fireplace, it was perfect to nap infront of. We brought our bikes and found the quiet roads perfect for ride around. The cabin is well built and really provides privacy without being too far from store for basic odds and ends. Will be recommending this spot to other couples who need a getaway.
We were looking for a short peaceful break away from city living. This was it! Relaxing, peaceful, and cozy. Don’t hesitate. This place is great!
Very nice place and was described just as it was. very peaceful.
Loved the place it was amazing, would definitely go again!
It’s was awesome getaway
We had a wonderful stay in Meadville, besides having to unexpectedly leave early due to a pet emergency. Host was very responsive and on the ball. Overall a fantastic stay near Erie.

Quiet, peaceful, and clean.
Very pleasant and thoughtfully laid out; an excellent use of available space.
It was incredibly clean!
If you’re looking for a quiet and private retreat, this fits the bill nicely.
Some caveats:
Access to the second floor, where the only bed is, is by a staircase that is basically like a ladder. If you have mobility issues it will be inaccessible.
The hot tub was well serviced but it is on a pad not covered by a roof- inclement weather will keep you from using it.
Not good or bad, just more info:
The tap water has a strong iron taste and smell, typical for well water in this area.
The decorations are very Christian centric, for some people this is a positive, for those who are not Christian it may be off putting.
The property is on a dirt road, it doesn’t require 4WD drive, but I’d be careful in snow or rain.
We had excellent cell service on the AT&T network.

We stayed here on our honeymoon a year ago and were privileged to be able to spend our first anniversary at the same place. Jonathan was a great host like always and we thoroughly enjoyed our relaxing time there.
